Ma_Sys.ma D5Man is a locally run knowledge base consisting of: d5manapi -- a server to provide metadata access d5mantui -- a client to interactively query the server d5manexportpdf -- a script to export D5Man pages to PDF d5manexporthtml -- a script to export D5Man trees to HTML pages
